constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 62 (Thursday, April 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUDD:
H.R. 7450.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 of the Constitution:
``Congress shall have Power To . . . provide for the common
Defence and general Welfare of the United States.''
Article I, Section 8, clause 4 of the Constitution:
``Congress shall have Power To . . . establish a uniform Rule
of Naturalization.''
[Page H4434]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Build the Wall Now Act
